item.title: Component Version
item.description: The ComponentVersion API produces component descriptors for a specific component version. Example # The following is an example of a ComponentVersion: apiVersion: delivery.ocm.software/v1alpha1 kind: ComponentVersion metadata: name: podinfo namespace: default spec: interval: 10m0s component: phoban.io/podinfo repository: url: ghcr.io/phoban01 version: semver: ">=6.3.x" In the above example: A ComponentVersion named podinfo is created, indicated by the .metadata.name field. The ocm-controller checks the OCM repository every 10m0s, indicated by the .spec.interval field. It retrieves the version matching the semver constraint specified by .
